name: World War Shroom
description:
World War Shroom is an engine building tabletop wargame for 2-4 players about fungal colonies competing to overtake a city.

It was created in 2 days for the Winchester Green Week Jam by students Liz Miller, Harrison Smart and Ariele Borghi.

The download includes assets that can be used for print and play, and a Tabletop Simulator save file (the suggested way to try this out).

This is an unplaytested prototype, but we hope you find it fun!
